name: Tuna Run
description:
TUNA RUN
You're a tuna can. Can you escape?

Roll dice to reveal new tiles and create a path to escape! 

Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - "Roll the Dice"

Critics are saying:

"I got one million. What's your score?"

"Best tuna related game."

Credits:

Art: Tahlia Kristjansson (@tahliaeve) & Link Raptor (@linkraptorart)
Programming: Harrison, Jordan De Visser
Game Design: Kyle Wassink
